messages.message:
Hey Hamish thanks a lot for the feedback!

To view the complete contents of a cell you can double click on it - it will show the contents similar to in excel.
We are using the spreadsheet component for rendering tables, so we may not be able to change a lot of things here, and that's the reason for some of the UI elements here - but we'll definitely look into how to best get the improvements in.
@tj.serkes can we do a design session on the table viewer and explore the improvement opportunities here.

cc @Kaustubh (KD) @Balaram

Thanks for sharing the feedback here. As a heads up, we are working with design (TJ has already been tagged) to iterate on better interaction model here with the spreadsheet component. Again unsure of the realm of easy here, but some of these are feedback points that TJ and I have briefly discussed.
@Aayush thanks - I think with tables you are usually interested in more than one cells results (the whole column) so the double click is useful but doesnâ€™t really solve the problem fully
